  • Labs

      • Convertify Labs

        Free apps to help you increase your conversion rate.


      • Plugins

      • Pre-populator

        Adds prepopulation to forms to increase conversions.

      • Scrollmark

        Optimize your blog's usability and allow linking to certain sections to of your content.

      • Convertify Apps

      • Convertilyzer

        Analyzes your website design and your analytics to give conversion optimization recommendations.

      • Boomerang

        Reduce cart abandonment on your online store.

      • SideStage

        Call-to-actions optimized for today's banner-blindness which allows A/B testing of CTA's.

      • Personify

        Personalize your site with URL parameters.

      • Tools

      • Selector Tool

        Identify selectors on your site for use in tools & goal-tracking.

      • Multistepper

        Adds pre-population to your forms to increase conversions.

      • Quantify

        Quantify surveys quickly. Integrates with Qualaroo.

      • Event Buddy

        Easily create GA events without any technical knowledge required.

    19 February 2012

    Case Study: Datapilot - 42.7% Increase in Sales

    Case Study: Datapilot - 42.7% Increase in Sales

    Susteen Inc. is a mobile software company known for their product Datapilot which is a software that allows non-smartphones to sync all its data with your computer, as well as syncing that data to another phone. We optimized their main product sales page which was converting at 4.81% and were able to increase this conversion rate to 6.86% for an improvement of 42.7%. This also means an increase on advertising...... Read More

affiliate

    19 February 2012

    Conversion Optimization Case Study: Best Dating Canada

    Conversion Optimization Case Study: Best Dating Canada

    Best Dating Sites Canada is a website that writes reviews on dating sites and monetizes via affiliate linking to them. They came to us looking to increase the out-going click-through-rate from their site to the affiliate sites in an effort to raise revenue per visitors. After several tests and optimizations we were able to raise revenue per visitor from $1.01 to $1.25 creating a **24% increase **in total revenue.  ... Read More

    Tracking & Optimizing Review Sites with Google Website Optimizer (or Any Page with Multiple Outoing Links)

    Tracking & Optimizing Review Sites with Google Website Optimizer (or Any Page with Multiple Outoing Links)

    Google Website Optimizer is a great tool for split-testing in order to increase conversions, but it requires a single thank you page. What if you are just trying to improve the outgoing CTR’s going from your review site (or any page with multiple links for the matter) to outgoing links, such as affiliate links? In this case, a “conversion” would be an outgoing click. Since GWO doesn’t have a way...... Read More
